body.name: Mr. Coffee 12 Cup Dishwashable Coffee Maker with Advanced Water Filtration & Permanent Filter
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 20 mins

features: Note: 1)Too coarse a grind, too little coffee, or insufficiently tamping the grounds before brewing can all lead to inadequate pressure for a proper brew. 2)It is important to note that the amount of espresso extracted will vary depending on the grind size and amount and reprogramming may be needed when the size and amount are adjusted.Filter type:Reusable

Easy cleaning: The simple design of this Mr. Coffee Coffee maker means the parts exposed to loose grounds and water Can be easily removed from the base, disassembled and put in the dishwasher; Caution: the electrical base, power Cord, and plug of the dish washable Coffee maker are not dishwasher safe and should never be immersed in water or other liquids
Clean coffeemaker = better Coffee: in the dishwasher, bitter Coffee residue is thoroughly removed to ensure a better tasting cup of Coffee

Coffee when you want it: Dishwasher safe Coffee maker features Grab a cup auto Pause so if you're in a rush, you can drink a cup before brewing finishes, and brew now, brew later, so you can set the Coffee maker to brew exactly when you want it to
Advanced water filtration system that reduces impurities like calcium and chlorine for even better tasting Coffee (replacement cartridges sold separately)
Larger brew basket: bigger brew basket holds 25 percent more grounds than comparable Mr. Coffee 12 cup Coffee makers
More great features: 4 hour auto shut off, automatic clean cycle, a large reusable filter, and 1 year limited warranty
body.description: Enjoy better-tasting Coffee with the Mr. Coffee 12 Cup programmable Coffee maker with dish washable design. It features an easy-to-clean design, and is simple to take apart and reassemble. Dishwashing removes bitter residue by thoroughly cleaning Parts exposed to coffee grounds and water. caution: the electrical base, power Cord, and plug of the dish washable Coffee maker are not dishwasher safe and should never be immersed in water or other liquids , Black/Chrome.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dishwashable* Design for Better Taste Enjoy better-tasting coffee made with the new Mr. Coffee Dishwashable* Coffee Maker, which provides you with a simple way to clean your coffee maker. It removes bitter coffee residue by allowing you to thoroughly clean parts exposed to coffee grounds and water. The design is simple to take apart and reassemble, making cleaning a breeze. *CAUTION: The electrical base, power cord, and plug of the Dishwashable Coffee Maker are not dishwasher-safe and should never be immersed in water or other liquids.

Brew Now or Brew Later Brew now, or set brewing ahead of time to enjoy delicious coffee exactly when you want it. Grab-a-Cup Auto Pause Need coffee ASAP? Auto Pause lets you grab a cup of coffee before the brewing cycle is finished. Advanced Water Filtration Includes 2-step advanced water filtration system to reduce calcium and chlorine for better-tasting coffee.

Mr. Coffee 12-Cup Coffee Maker Mr. Coffee 12-Cup with Dishwashable Design Mr. Coffee Easy Measure Coffee Maker Mr. Coffee HotCup Coffee Maker Mr. Coffee Occasions Coffee Maker Category Automatic Drip Automatic Drip Automatic Drip Single Serve Automatic Drip, Single Serve, & Espresso Designed For Simply Great Coffee Clean, Great Tasting Coffee Consistency in Every Cup Hot, Full-Bodied Single Serve Coffee for any Occasion Key Features Easy to Use Unique Dishwashable Design Easy Measure System, Advanced Filtration, & Freshness Reminder Kettle-Heating Technology All-in-One Compact Design Carafe Type Glass Glass Glass Thermal Serving Size 4-12 Cups (20-60oz) 4-12 Cups (20-60oz) 4-12 Cups (20-60oz) 0.75-1.5 Cups (6-12oz) 4-10 Thermal Cups (20-50oz); 1-2 Espresso Shots; 6,8,10,12oz single serve Warming Plate yes, 2-hour yes, 4-hour yes, 4-hour Pause and Serve ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Coffee Filter Type 12-Cup Basket Style 12-Cup Basket Style 12-Cup Basket Style #2 Cone (Flat) 10-Cup Basket Style Advanced Water Filter Compatible ✓ Programmable/Brew Later ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love that this coffeemaker can be washed. The biggest complaint I have for all of my other coffee makers is cleaning. Great. You can run vinegar through but that does not get rid of the "gunk" left behind. I tried using a skewer with a paper towel, thin cloth, etc. I would just buy new ones every year. This is a GAME CHANGER> Not super sturdy but for the price? You can't beat it. Simple to use AND -- our power surged for a minute or so and the clock remembered the time and settings. You get Thumbs up on this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mr. Coffee washable coffee machine
reviews.reviewText: There has been bad reviews on this but maybe with the newer ones they corrected the problems of past. Mine works fine! Some reviews said the (finished brewing) beep was loud, mine is soft. Some said the flip lid is hard to take off to wash, mine I put a drop of vegetable oil on the tip of my finger and put it on the hinge and it comes off ok all the time now without putting a drop of oil on it. Some complained on the 4 hour shutoff. I usually drink my coffee by then and just turn it off. I like how you can take half of it apart and put it in the dishwasher, the other half you can’t because it’s the electrical part. So far I’m very pleased!! Mostly I like the water filter on it, it’s a little smaller then the Keurig filters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Makes Coffee well... Having a reoccurring issue with the brew button...
reviews.reviewText: The previous one worked quite well for some time, but my brew now button started giving me fits on the weekends when I didn't use auto-brew... It would be difficult to activate and finally stopped working at all... the Auto-Brew functioned though... So I got a new one, it cost more this time, but it wasn't surprising...Now it started doing the same thing after a much shorter time... I think the defect is in the button itself...since it was identical in nature a bad batch of parts makes sense to me... Having been so long between purchases makes me wonder how many of these are doing to same thing to other people...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and clean
reviews.reviewText: The working parts can go in the dishwasher. Amazing. Why they all don't do this is strange. There are no tricks to learn, the entire top tips up to easily pour a full pot of water in, and filling the filter with coffee is a breeze.I have owned coffeemakers where pouting the water in meant getting a mop, and have had some strangely engineered filter holders - a thing of the past. The clock is easy to adjust.Amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Choose another brand
reviews.reviewText: --UPDATE-- After having the coffee pot for only 2 months... And without even using it on a daily basis... The unit stopped being able to pump water from the tank into the coffree brew basket. In addition to the notes below, the machine is now completely worthless and broken. DO. NOT. BUY. THIS.*******************I saw a customer review, before making the purchase... Warning that the spring-loaded stopper on the bottom of the filter basket was extraordinarily flimsy. They said - it broke off the first time they cleaned the unit. KNOWING THIS ISSUE - I was as cautious as any human person could ever be when attempting to clean the filter basket. Guess what? The cheap materials broke anyway. DO NOT BUY. I have only had the unit for 3 weeks and it's already busted.Due to this flaw - Now I cannot let the grounds steep (at least until the brew basket is starting to become full of hot water) before putting the pot underneath, nor can I remove the pot while the unit is still brewing.Note: I bought a Mr. Coffee 2-in-1 that had K-cup and thermos carafe, so that guests could use K-cups if they want. It leaked the whole water tank on the counter on a regular basis. It stopped making hot coffee after a few months (even the first cup, freshly brewed, had to be microwaved before drinking). The size selection did not work - in order to brew a full pot I had to run the unit twice over (from day one). I struggled with it so long, that I SWORE that I would not buy Mr. Coffee when shopping for the replacement. But I fell for another gimmick.Mr. Coffee brand, which used to be affordable yet quality products, is now just gimmicks. They sell you on a 2-in-1 and the engineering/materials/design are horrible. They sell you on the "easy to disassemble and clean" gimmick, but the materials are so cheap that handling them for cleaning will always result in damage to the unit.I will never buy anything from Mr. Coffee again after he last two coffeemakers were total trash. Thanks for nothing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Coffee Maker
reviews.reviewText: Mr. Coffee 12 Cup Programmable Coffee Maker with Dish-washable Design is fantastic. It's unique in that the entire top portion of the coffee maker comes apart very easily for cleaning, even the internal sprayer separates for easy cleaning. I love the carbon filter, makes the coffee much less bitter and it's a feature that is not easy to find in an affordable coffee maker (once you own a coffee maker that has an internal filter you will not settle for one that does not have this feature - makes a huge difference in the taste of the coffee. Basic coffee makers pale in comparison.) The coffee maker is simple to set up and program. The coffee maker stays hot for two hours and then turns off automatically so you don't have to worry about forgetting to turn off the coffee maker - it does it for you! The coffee maker brews 12 / 5 oz cups of coffee in under 10 minutes and then beeps quickly when it's done. There seems to be a slight low buzz noise coming from the clock at the base of the unit but I don't think it's a problem (I noticed the noise when I plugged the unit in - has nothing to do with the brewing process). I'm very satisfied with the coffee maker. It has all the features that I was looking for in a coffee pot at a very affordable price. Makes a delicious cup of coffee!

Ok Ive had my maker for a few weeks now and I am extremely satisfied with it for several reasons. Brews very hot coffee, timer set up so I can wake up to ready made coffee, easy to clean with dishwasher placement option, minimal buttons, very neat feature that brings the water arm bar to correct spot if you forget and lastly brews full body coffee flavor! I love this machine.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super easy to use and no BPA involved....as per company claim.
reviews.reviewText: Have only been using it for a couple of weeks....so far, so good.Coffee tastes great, haven’t researched where to get filter that goes into the water reservoir yet or the cost.Recommended not to use hard/well water, no choice though and I won’t purchase bottled water. Nothing to do with cost more the plastic issue...way too much plastic. Trying to eliminate as much plastic use as possible.
